inclusion.criterion: Evidence of chronic HCV infection for at least 6 months before study entry (at least one detectable HCV viral load, i.e. ≥17 IU/mL, with an antibody test positive at least 6 months before the HCV RNA load result)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fibrosis Stage F2-3-4 determined by transient elastography (Fibroscan or other similar equipment). During the first part of the study, priority will be given to patients with Fibrosis Stage F2-3.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any conditions that, in the investigator's judgment, may compromise the follow up.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contra-indication to study treatment (including pregnancy or lack of effective contraception in the participant or female partner)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection for at least 6 months and fibrosis stage F2-3. However, there is no clear indication of severe liver damage, advanced stage cirrhosis or cancer.
